idea:
Rapid Rupee offers users the benefit of instant cash (upon successful registration), within a disbursal time of as little as 2 hours with a guarantee of zero paperwork. Rapid Rupee is here to change the money lending game and make instant cash accessible to all Indians.

Using new-age technology and a user-friendly interface, Rapid Rupee is able to approve loans within just 20 minutes. In a country like India where uncertainties rule daily life, Rapid Rupee and its services are a game-changer for a multitude of people. We are a team of tech-lovers, innovative thinkers and doers, who work hard so our consumers can take it easy.
name: RapidRupee
